channel.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
channel.description:
This game is based on the Helicopter game; In which you must dodge the walls or you crash!
[scar] { Welcome To Ball-Escape - Created By XxKanexX..
- You are a ball being pulled downwards; - Problem is, If you hit the top or bottom edge - Of the screen, You crash! Burst!
- The Aim of the game is to dodge the brick walls - And top and bottom edges - Using the mouse. Click the left mouse to raise - The ball and click nothing to let it fall.
Press "P" To Pause.
Enjoy! } [/scar]
[img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/8252/startzy3.png[/img]
[img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/2297/ingamegl1.png[/img]
[img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/3359/crashednk5.png[/img]
Once you crash you view all your scores and such. Also a lag prevent theory.
If you get bored at Level 1 - 3 waiting for it to upgrade in Speed you can change the Level up the top! Your score will still start from 0, though.
[b]Ball Escape v2[/b] Added gravitational pull. It gets harder to rise the longer you hold your click and you fall faster the longer your click has been released.
Added X Exploring. The ball will now swerve around the screen making it even harder to dodge bricks. It's mostly all the same except timing so you can adjust to the pattern.
The level is now written in the debug box to avoid lag when it is displayed in the canvas.
There is only always small bricks now as big ones were hard to dodge in increasing speeds.
IF YOU DON'T LIKE XPLORING SCROLL TO THE TOP AND CHANGE XROAMING TO FALSE!
Created by XxKanexX - Post any errors! And Enjoy!
<3

item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Took the time to do some adjusting. The X exploring is a little hard to get used to and will make you crash alot easier, sorry about that.

IF YOU DON’T LIKE XPLORING SCROLL TO THE TOP AND CHANGE XROAMING TO FALSE!

[b]Ball Escape v2[/b] Added gravitational pull. It gets harder to rise the longer you hold your click and you fall faster the longer your click has been released.

Added X Exploring. The ball will now swerve around the screen making it even harder to dodge bricks. It’s mostly all the same except timing so you can adjust to the pattern.

The level is now written in the debug box to avoid lag when it is displayed in the canvas.

There is only always small bricks now as big ones were hard to dodge in increasing speeds.

item.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i spent last night working on this, i always wanted to make one of these for a SCAR game which wasnt my own, so here it is

A Bot For Ball Escape

in the script there are instructions for adding some SendInterSCARMessages into the game, sort of like hacking the runescape client only much easier.

the script, Bot for BallEscape reads these InterSCARMessages and controls the ball though the game,

Features

  1. Only has to click at the beginning of the game, can be running in the background
  2. Close the debug image and minimise the SCAR windows, it will still work
  3. Aryan worked like this, thats where i got the idea from
  4. Works up to about level 40 (depends on the computer)

i use something like this for testing my game ice magick (only it used find colors)

Kane, you didnt have to spend ages testing it, you could have just write one of these

People, post a picture of the highest score you got from this, leave it overnight or something

Read full topic

item.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Yeh Weibs i found that out when i woke up lol. Then i cursed a few times.

That was in there for testing purposes and brick sizes and places. But i uploaded it when i didn’t save. I’ll upload the new one now. :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 29, 2006, 12:05:31 AM[/size][hr]Added a new version. Fixed the colon error and now it will always have a different Brick place every new brick. So it’s more unexpected.

It also Starts on Level 1, too. To make things a bit faster.

Read full topic

item.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Dang, thats pretty awesome. Some day I’m gonna learn to make games in the debug image.

Just one thing, when I downloaded it, I got a ‘:’ expected in script error. It was just missing a begin and end after each case:

case Random(8) of 0: By:= 0; Writeln('0'); 1: By:= 260; Writeln('260'); 2: By:= 130; Writeln('130'); 4: By:= 60; Writeln('60'); 5: By:= 190; Writeln('190'); 6: By:= 30; Writeln('30'); 7: By:= 210; Writeln('210'); end;

When I changed it to this:

case Random(8) of 0: Begin By:= 0; Writeln('0'); End; 1: Begin By:= 260; Writeln('260'); End; 2: Begin By:= 130; Writeln('130'); End; 4: Begin By:= 60; Writeln('60'); End; 5: Begin By:= 190; Writeln('190'); End; 6: Begin By:= 30; Writeln('30'); End; 7: Begin By:= 210; Writeln('210'); End; end;

It worked. Just a minor bug. But still, great game, I enjoyed it for the 3 levels I lasted, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:4, topic:16449”]nice one kane, i got to level 6 but i crashed because it wasnt paying attention, i dont think it was a good idea to put const startlevel =0; as the first line of coding, people will see that and put in 20 (like i did)

i can see you got the inspiration from that copter game

theres something about the game play, its too slow in the early levels and its gets quite boring (thats why i wasnt paying attention) make it start at the speed that level 10 is

i dont know if your updating it, you head must hurt, take a break once in a while, dont burn yourself out like an overpaid Formula 1,

i did find a bug about the level displaying the text, it flickered, thats probably because you drew it on at a different time to the buffer bitmap, if you cant get it to work use the function CreateBitmapMaskFromText[/quote]
It’s meant to flash. So that’s probably why it flickers. Didn’t turn out as i wanted it to, hehe

I put it on level 100, Lasted .5 of a second. And all the FastDrawing things, including the text, canvas, ect is done at the same time in the DrawBitmap procedure.

I know it’s a little slow, But i suppose people could just start on level 2 or 3. It gets boring, but most people who i gave it to to test said it started to fast originally.

You can always Start on Level 10 if you wish

Thanks for you post, and the compliment.

Read full topic

item.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

nice one kane, i got to level 6 but i crashed because it wasnt paying attention, i dont think it was a good idea to put const startlevel =0; as the first line of coding, people will see that and put in 20 (like i did)

i can see you got the inspiration from that copter game

theres something about the game play, its too slow in the early levels and its gets quite boring (thats why i wasnt paying attention) make it start at the speed that level 10 is

i dont know if your updating it, you head must hurt, take a break once in a while, dont burn yourself out like an overpaid Formula 1,

i did find a bug about the level displaying the text, it flickered, thats probably because you drew it on at a different time to the buffer bitmap, if you cant get it to work use the function CreateBitmapMaskFromText

Read full topic

item.title: Ball-Escape [Scar Game!] V2!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

This game is based on the Helicopter game; In which you must dodge the walls or you crash!

[scar]
{ Welcome To Ball-Escape - Created By XxKanexX…

  • You are a ball being pulled downwards;

  • Problem is, If you hit the top or bottom edge

  • Of the screen, You crash! Burst!

  • The Aim of the game is to dodge the brick walls

  • And top and bottom edges

  • Using the mouse. Click the left mouse to raise

  • The ball and click nothing to let it fall.

Press “P” To Pause.

Enjoy!
}
[/scar]

Once you crash you view all your scores and such. Also a lag prevent theory.

If you get bored at Level 1 - 3 waiting for it to upgrade in Speed you can change the Level up the top! Your score will still start from 0, though.

Ball Escape v2
Added gravitational pull. It gets harder to rise the longer you hold your click and you fall faster the longer your click has been released.

Added X Exploring. The ball will now swerve around the screen making it even harder to dodge bricks. It’s mostly all the same except timing so you can adjust to the pattern.

The level is now written in the debug box to avoid lag when it is displayed in the canvas.

There is only always small bricks now as big ones were hard to dodge in increasing speeds.

IF YOU DON’T LIKE XPLORING SCROLL TO THE TOP AND CHANGE XROAMING TO FALSE!

Created by XxKanexX - Post any errors!
And Enjoy!

<3
